name: Decorator Pattern
description: Implement a coffee decorator pattern. Given a base coffee type ('espresso'=2.0, 'americano'=2.5) and decorators array (['milk'=0.5, 'sugar'=0.2, 'whip'=0.7]), return [total_price, description]. Build the description like 'espresso + milk + sugar'.
hints: Start with base coffee, then apply each decorator to add to price and description. Decorators wrap and extend the base object's behavior.
